original_text: Then I saw another angel flying in midair, and he had the eternal gospel to proclaim to those who live on the earth—to every nation, tribe, language and people.
korean_text: 또 보니 다른 천사가 공중에 날아가는데 땅에 거주하는 자들 곧 모든 민족과 종족과 방언과 백성에게 전할 영원한 복음을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: and he had the eternal gospel
to proclaim to those who live on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 사는 자들에게 전파하기 위한 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: to every nation, tribe, language and people
